api_list.api_description: Fetch the favicon for a given domain. Optionally, specify the size of the favicon.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain from which to fetch the favicon.

optional_parameters.name: sz
optional_parameters.description: The size of the favicon in pixels (e.g., 16, 32, 64, 128, 256). Defaults to the smallest available size if not specified.

api_list.api_description: Fetch the fallback favicon if the specified size is not available. The API returns the default 16x16 favicon if the requested size is not found.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain from which to fetch the favicon.

optional_parameters.name: sz
optional_parameters.description: The size of the favicon in pixels. Defaults to 16 if not specified or if the requested size is unavailable.

query: Please fetch the favicon for the domain stackoverflow.com in 128x128 size. If the specified size is not available, get the default fallback size.
